welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Son en Breugel, a charming city in the Netherlands known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, with state-of-the-art facilities and equipment.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
